bibl.title: Rogue Notaries? Two Unusual Double Documents from the Late Ptolemaic Fayum.
bibl.note: 1. P. Fay. 240 descr. Loan of radish seed. Euhemeria, 30 August 74 (?) BC. - 2. P. Mich. Inv. 3380. Loan of money. Theadelphia, 22 December 71 (?) BC. - Pp. 113-115: Appendix. Registered grapheion contracts with missing or incomplete body contract. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Fay. 240 descr. P. Mich. Inv. 3380
W. Graham Claytor, Rogue Notaries? Two Unusual Double Documents from the Late Ptolemaic Fayum.

1. P. Fay. 240 descr. Loan of radish seed. Euhemeria, 30 August 74 (?) BC. - 2. P. Mich. Inv. 3380. Loan of money. Theadelphia, 22 December 71 (?) BC. - Pp. 113-115: Appendix. Registered grapheion contracts with missing or incomplete body contract. - Avec résumé en anglais.
